greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Shift operator, left.
comment: Let A129185 = M, then M*V (V a vector), shifts V to the left. Example M*V, V = [1, 2, 3,...] = [2, 3, 4,...]. A129184 = right shift operator.
link: Franck Ramaharo, A bracket polynomial for 2-tangle shadows, arXiv:2002.06672 [math.CO], 2020.
formula: As an infinite matrix, all 1's in the superdiagonal and the rest zeros.
example: First few rows of the matrix are:
results.author: _Gary W. Adamson_, Apr 01 2007
